Abstract: Sarah Ludwig, executive director of Neighborhood Economic Development Advocacy Group, believes New York City should have a nonprofit people's bank, where the poor would have access to their accounts at kiosks in community gatherings spots and be able to pay bills electronically, shop online and obtain mortgages (S)
